articles.title: Oil hits 7-year highs as market fears Russian attack on Ukraine imminent
articles.description: Russia is one of the world#39;s largest oil and gas producers, and fears that it could invade Ukraine have driven the rally in oil closer to $100 per barrel, a level not seen since 2014.

articles.title: World Bank, IMF relocate some staff from Ukraine, operations continue
articles.description: The World Bank said in an internal memo seen by Reuters that it has temporarily suspended staff missions to Ukraine and is closely monitoring the situation at the border, where Russia has massed a large military force within striking distance of Ukraine.

articles.title: Wednesday? Next week? Ukraine invasion predictions cause turmoil, roil markets
articles.description: U.S. intelligence has been closely monitoring troop, equipment and other moves in the region, while trying to factor in international events, like the Beijing Olympics and an upcoming meeting of Western allies.
articles.content:

articles.title: Canada#39;s Justin Trudeau invokes emergency powers in bid to end protests

articles.description: The decision was taken after the audit committee#39;s meeting, also scheduled on February 14 to approve third-quarter financial results remained #39;inconclusive#39; and was adjourned to February 15.

articles.title: Zerodha का मुनाफा FY21 में 164% बढ़कर 1,122 करोड़ हुआ, रेवेन्यू तीन गुना उछला
articles.description: ऑनलाइन स्टॉक ब्रोकिंग फर्म जीरोधा (Zerodha) का नेट प्रॉफिट वित्त वर्ष 2021 में 164.7 फीसदी बढ़कर 1,122.31 करोड़ रुपये रहा, जो इसके पिछले वित्त वर्ष में 43.95 करोड़ रुपये था। वित्त वर्ष 2021 में कोरोना महामारी के दौरान ऑनलाइन ट्रेंडिंग में लोगों की काफी दिलचस्…
